response.original_title: Mysterious Origins of Man: Rewriting Man's History
response.overview: Oscar winner Charlton Heston narrates this thought-provoking documentary that takes a creationist view to human history. The program originally aired on NBC amid a considerable cloud of controversy in 1996. Among its most provocative assertions is that humans actually lived with dinosaurs, a conclusion based on artifacts recovered from Peruvian grave robbers and other evidence that has long been locked away in museum storage.
response.title: Mysterious Origins of Man: Rewriting Man's History
